hadiths.text: Jafar bin Muahammad narrated that his father said:"We came to Jabir bin Abdullah and he told us that the Messenger of Allah said: 'All of Al Muzdalifah is a place for (the pilgrims) to stand

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ لَمْ يُدْرِكْ صَلاَةَ الصُّبْحِ مَعَ الإِمَامِ بِالْمُزْدَلِفَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Does Not Catch Subh With The Imam In Al-Muzdalifah
